definition[0]: government money that is paid to people who are unemployed, old, ill etc
note[0]: be/live on social security (=be receiving money from the government)
definition[1]: a US government programme into which workers must make regular payments, and which pays money regularly to old people and people who are unable to work
definition[2]: government money that is paid to people who are unemployed, old, or ill
example[1]: Are you receiving social security benefits?
example[2]: Cutbacks in social security payments were implemented on April 1st.
definition[3]: a system of insurance run by the US government, into which workers make regular payments, and which provides money when they are unable to work, especially because they are old
example[3]: spending on programs such as Social Security and Medicare
example[4]: I need your name, age, and Social Security number.
